mapper.select:
SELECT admission.admission_nm , attend.attend_cd , attend.type_nm, attend.attend_date, attend.attend_time , attend_manage.head_nm, attend_manage.bldg_nm , examinee.dept_nm, examinee.examinee_cd, examinee.examinee_nm , date_format(examinee.birth, '%y-%m-%d') as birth , attend_map.attend_dttm , attend_manage.id_check_dttm FROM attend_manage INNER JOIN attend ON attend_manage.attend_cd = attend.attend_cd INNER JOIN admission ON attend.admission_cd = admission.admission_cd INNER JOIN examinee ON attend_manage.examinee_cd = examinee.examinee_cd INNER JOIN attend_map ON attend_manage.attend_cd = attend_map.attend_cd AND attend_manage.examinee_cd = attend_map.examinee_cd
AND attend_manage.is_no_id_card = TRUE
AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND attend.type_nm = #{param.typeNm} AND attend.attend_date = #{param.attendDate} AND attend.attend_time = DATE_FORMAT(#{param.attendTime}, '%T') AND attend_manage.head_nm = #{param.headNm} AND attend_manage.bldg_nm = #{param.bldgNm} AND examinee.dept_nm = #{param.deptNm} AND examinee.examinee_cd LIKE '%' #{param.examineeCd} '%' AND examinee.examinee_nm LIKE '%' #{param.examineeNm} '%' AND attend.admission_cd IN (${param.userAdmissions})
AND attend_map.attend_hall_cd IS NOT NULL AND attend_map.attend_hall_cd IS NULL
AND attend_manage.id_check_dttm IS NOT NULL AND attend_manage.id_check_dttm IS NULL

SELECT admission.admission_nm , attend.attend_cd, attend.type_nm, attend.attend_date, attend.attend_time , hall.hall_cd, hall.head_nm, hall.bldg_nm, hall.hall_nm , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attend_map WHERE attend_map.hall_cd = hall.hall_cd and attend_map.attend_cd = attend_hall.attend_cd) as attend_cnt , CASE WHEN attend_hall.sign_dttm IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS is_signature , attend_hall.sign_dttm, hall.is_etc FROM attend_hall INNER JOIN attend ON attend_hall.attend_cd = attend.attend_cd INNER JOIN admission ON attend.admission_cd = admission.admission_cd INNER JOIN hall ON attend_hall.hall_cd = hall.hall_cd
AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND attend.type_nm = #{param.typeNm} AND attend.attend_date = #{param.attendDate} AND attend.attend_time = DATE_FORMAT(#{param.attendTime}, '%T') AND hall.head_nm = #{param.headNm} AND hall.bldg_nm = #{param.bldgNm} AND hall.hall_nm = #{param.hallNm}
AND hall.is_etc = TRUE AND hall.is_etc = FALSE
AND attend_hall.sign_dttm IS NOT NULL AND attend_hall.sign_dttm IS NULL
AND attend.admission_cd IN (${param.userAdmissions})

SELECT examinee.examinee_cd, examinee.examinee_nm, examinee.dept_nm, hall.bldg_nm, hall.hall_nm, attend_paper.paper_cd, attend_paper.paper_no, concat(attend.attend_date,' ',attend.attend_time) as attend_d_t, attend_paper.reg_dttm FROM attend_paper INNER JOIN attend ON attend.attend_cd = attend_paper.attend_cd INNER JOIN hall ON hall.hall_cd = attend_paper.hall_cd INNER JOIN examinee ON examinee.examinee_cd = attend_paper.examinee_cd
examinee.examinee_cd = #{param.examineeCd} AND attend.admission_cd IN (${param.userAdmissions})

SELECT examinee.examinee_cd, examinee.examinee_nm , IF(attend_map.attend_hall_cd is not null, 'N', 'Y') as attendYn , attend.attend_date , attend.attend_time , (SELECT attend_paper.paper_cd FROM attend_paper WHERE attend_paper.attend_cd = attend_map.attend_cd AND attend_paper.examinee_cd = attend_map.examinee_cd AND attend_map.attend_hall_cd IS NOT NULL ORDER BY attend_paper.reg_dttm DESC LIMIT 1 ) as paper_cd , (select univ_hall_cd from attend_hall where hall_cd=attend_map.hall_cd and attend_cd = attend_map.attend_cd) as hall_cd , h1.hall_nm , (select univ_hall_cd from attend_hall where hall_cd=attend_map.attend_hall_cd and attend_cd = attend_map.attend_cd) as attend_hall_cd , h2.hall_nm as attend_hall_nm FROM attend_map INNER JOIN attend ON attend.attend_cd = attend_map.attend_cd and attend.paper_cnt > 0 INNER JOIN admission ON admission.admission_cd = attend.admission_cd INNER JOIN examinee ON attend_map.examinee_cd = examinee.examinee_cd INNER JOIN hall h1 ON attend_map.hall_cd = h1.hall_cd LEFT JOIN hall h2 ON attend_map.attend_hall_cd = h2.hall_cd
AND attend.admission_cd IN (${param.userAdmissions}) AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND attend.attend_date = #{param.attendDate} AND attend.attend_time = DATE_FORMAT(#{param.attendTime}, '%T')

select admission.admission_nm, attend.type_nm , examinee.dept_nm, examinee.major_nm , examinee.examinee_cd, examinee.examinee_nm, examinee.birth , hall.head_nm, hall.bldg_nm, hall.hall_nm, (SELECT attend_paper.paper_cd FROM attend_paper WHERE attend_paper.attend_cd = attend_map.attend_cd AND attend_paper.examinee_cd = attend_map.examinee_cd ORDER BY attend_paper.reg_dttm DESC LIMIT 1 ) as last_paper_cd , attend_map.attend_dttm from attend_map inner join attend on attend.attend_cd = attend_map.attend_cd inner join hall on hall.hall_cd = attend_map.hall_cd inner join admission on admission.admission_cd = attend.admission_cd inner join examinee on examinee.examinee_cd = attend_map.examinee_cd left join attend_paper on attend_paper.examinee_cd = attend_map.examinee_cd and attend_map.attend_cd = attend_paper.attend_cd and attend_map.attend_dttm is null and attend_paper.paper_cd is not null
AND attend.admission_cd IN (${param.userAdmissions})

SELECT admission.admission_nm, attend_doc.title, attend_doc.content, attend_doc.sign_date, attend_doc.sign , examinee.examinee_cd, examinee.examinee_nm, examinee.dept_nm FROM attend_manage INNER JOIN attend ON attend.attend_cd = attend_manage.attend_cd INNER JOIN admission ON admission.admission_cd = attend.admission_cd INNER JOIN examinee ON examinee.examinee_cd = attend_manage.examinee_cd INNER JOIN attend_doc ON attend_doc.admission_cd = attend.admission_cd
AND attend.admission_cd IN (${param.userAdmissions}) AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND attend.attend_date = STR_TO_DATE(#{param.attendDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND attend.attend_time = #{param.attendTime}
